webtoolsÂ¶

WebTools is web application framework built on top of WebOb. WebTools started as a fork of the webapp2 framework built for Google’s App Engine hosting environment. WebTools is release under the Apache Version 2.0 license.

Modules:

  • webtools.wsgi
  • webtools.route
  • webtools.handlers
  • webtools.helpers
  • webtools.request
  • webtools.response
